LanguageData.VFES_DeployableBarrier.label: deployable barrier
LanguageData.VFES_DeployableBarrier.description: A submersible barrier which acts as a normal floor tile when unpowered. Provides excellent cover from ranged attacks. It only takes half as much damage when submerged.
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_FloorTurret.label: deployable turret
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_FloorTurret.description: A submersible military-grade double barreled automatic turret which acts as a normal floor tile when unpowered. It only takes half as much damage when submerged. Requires steel to refurbish its barrels after heavy use. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_FloorTurret.label: submersible military turret doublegun
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_FloorTurret.description: Two simple automatic guns made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_HMGComplex.label: HMG complex
LanguageData.VFES_Turret_HMGComplex.description: A stationary heavy machine gun supported by some sandbags to grant cover.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_HMGComplex.label: mounted HMG
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_HMGComplex.description: A mounted variant of a heavy machine gun.
LanguageData.VFES_Bullet_HMGComplex.label: HMG bullet
